persona.positioning: Enterprise-grade engineer specializing in AI-enabled modernization and reliability.
persona.focus: Understand the client's problem deeply and deliver state-of-the-art, measurable solutions.
persona.promise: Client satisfaction through efficiency, reliability, and measurable business outcomes.

hero.headline: Engineering intelligence into every process.
hero.subheadline: I build reliable, AI-driven systems that replace time-consuming manual work—so your business runs faster, safer, and smarter.

one_on_one_variants: I help companies replace time-consuming manual work with smart, AI-driven systems that make their business faster and more reliable.
I design modern enterprise systems that eliminate inefficiency and prepare businesses for an AI-powered future.
I help leaders adopt AI without disrupting daily operations—boosting productivity without increasing headcount.
intros.website_bio_short: Software engineer specializing in enterprise-grade systems and AI modernization. I turn manual, error-prone processes into efficient, reliable software.
intros.website_bio_long: I’m a software engineer focused on building complex, reliable, enterprise-level applications that solve real business problems. I’ve worked with startups like Customaite and industry leaders such as Elia Group Belgium to modernize outdated, labor-heavy workflows into efficient, automated systems. My approach is simple: understand your challenges deeply, then deliver state-of-the-art solutions that improve performance, reduce errors, and scale with your growth. In an AI-driven world, the companies that adapt fastest win—I make sure my clients are among them.

propositions.title: Efficiency that compounds
propositions.description: Replace repetitive, manual steps with automation that saves hours every week.

propositions.title: Reliability by design
propositions.description: Enterprise patterns and rigorous testing to reduce errors and downtime.

propositions.title: AI where it matters
propositions.description: Practical, measurable AI that augments teams and accelerates outcomes.

propositions.title: Scalable foundations
propositions.description: Modern architectures that grow with the business, not against it.

proof_points: Delivered enterprise-grade solutions across startup and industrial environments
Hands-on with AI/automation in production systems
Track record of translating business goals into shipped software

services.name: AI & Automation Modernization
services.description: Implement AI copilots, workflow automation, and decision systems that reduce manual work and errors.

services.name: Enterprise System Design
services.description: Design and build reliable, scalable systems tailored to complex business operations.

services.name: Legacy Workflow Replacement
services.description: Transform time-consuming, spreadsheet or email-driven processes into robust applications.

steps.title: 01 — Discovery
steps.description: Deep-dive into your goals, constraints, and success metrics.

steps.title: 02 — Roadmap
steps.description: Clear milestones, risks, and ROI—before writing a line of code.

steps.title: 03 — Build
steps.description: Rapid iteration with testable increments and stakeholder feedback.

steps.title: 04 — Measure
steps.description: Track efficiency, error rates, and cycle times to prove value.

steps.title: 05 — Scale
steps.description: Harden, optimize, and extend as adoption grows.

statements: Your competitors are already integrating AI—don’t let legacy processes become your bottleneck.
In an AI-first market, operational speed is strategy. The gap widens every quarter.
Modernization isn’t optional anymore—it’s how leaders stay leaders.
